sentences.en: A cloud of volcanic ash is spreading across wide areas of the Philippines.
sentences.cn: 火山灰云层正在菲律宾大范围扩散。

sentences.en: A group of volcanic vents will produce a lava of the same mineral composition.
sentences.cn: 一群火山口将产生相同矿物成份的熔岩.

sentences.en: Basalt is the commonest volcanic rock.
sentences.cn: 玄武岩是最普通的火山岩.

sentences.en: Marilyn's pitted skin, breasts of carved pumice, volcanic thighs, a face of ash.
sentences.cn: 玛丽莲凹凸不平的皮肤, 浮石雕刻般的双乳, 火山似的大腿, 死一样苍白的脸.

sentences.en: Most volcanic eruptions in recorded history have blown skyward.
sentences.cn: 历史上有记载的大多数火山喷发是向天空喷发的.

sentences.en: Mount Unzen has been spewing out volcanic ash, gas, and rock today.
sentences.cn: 云仙山今天一直在向外喷涌火山灰、气体和火山岩。

sentences.en: Over 200 people have been killed by volcanic eruptions.
sentences.cn: 火山喷发已导致200多人丧生。

sentences.en: St Vincent is a lush, volcanic island.
sentences.cn: 圣文森特岛是座郁郁葱葱的火山岛。

sentences.en: Sulfur is found abundantly in volcanic regions.
sentences.cn: 硫在火山地区大量存在.

sentences.en: The city was entombed in volcanic lava.

sentences.cn: 这些岛屿是由火山构成的.

sentences.en: The place was recently visited by a serious volcanic eruption.
sentences.cn: 这地方最近发生了一次严重的火山爆发.

sentences.en: The vast volcanic slope was eerily reminiscent of a lunar landscape.
sentences.cn: 开阔的火山坡让人心生怪异地联想起月球的地貌。

sentences.en: The volcano spewed out more scorching volcanic ashes, gases and rocks.
sentences.cn: 火山喷出更多灼热的火山灰、气体和岩块。

sentences.en: There have been several volcanic eruptions this year.
sentences.cn: 今年火山爆发了好几次.

words.tran_cn: [岩][地质]火山的；猛烈的；易突然发作的

phrases.tran_cn: [地]火山玻璃（又称松脂石，火山熔岩急冷时形成的天然玻璃）；黑曜岩
火山岩；火成岩；火山碎屑岩

trans.tran_en: relating to or caused by a volcano
